item.description: Join us on June 16, Saturday, at 3:00 pm for a free oldies concert, starring Frankie Valli! Later on, we'll decide exactly where to meet and what type of 'meetup' sign or signal we'll have so we can find each other..the concert's at 7:00 pm..maybe we can all bring snacks and share with each other??? Then, after the concert, maybe meet somewhere for ice cream /dessert, whatever...sounds like fun!
item.name: Oldies Concert at the Hatch Shell!
